meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marianne Durgavich Greg Sullivan Bob Sutton Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #837.

td.p: Marianne Durgavich, a nurse from Watertown, Massachusetts
Greg Sullivan, an accountant from Yonkers, New York
Bob Sutton, an environmental chemist from Gainesville, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,650)

tr.td: WASHINGTON STATE
SHEEP
4-LETTER WORDS
SPORTS
GAUGES
(Alex: in reference to the film.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Bob] Yes, there was Andrew [*], who was a vice president and a president, there was Lyndon Baines [*], who was vice president and president; and there was a Richard [*], who was vice president only.)
MarianneWhat is Adams?
$1,800
BobWhat is Johnson?
$4,850
